scripts.install:all: npm run install:shared && npm run install:client && npm run install:server && npm run install:api && npm run install:worker
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run build:api && npm run build:worker
scripts.dev: concurrently -n client,server,api -c blue,green,yellow "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:api"
scripts.clean: npm run clean:shared && npm run clean:client && npm run clean:server && npm run clean:api && npm run clean:worker
scripts.clean:shared: cd shared && npm run clean || true
scripts.clean:client: cd website/client && npm run clean || true
scripts.clean:api: cd internal-api-server && npm run clean || true
